description:
This course is created with the purpose of giving you a blueprint on creating a membership site in WordPress by utilising the free plugins available.

It will teach you how to install a WordPress membership quickly and easy. You are not required to have a specific technical background but fundamental knowledge about the WordPress platform is highly recommended.

Who is this WordPress membership site course for? 

Have you ever wanted to create a membership site but felt stuck either because of the technical jargon required in order to set it up or by the high-cost products available?

Don’t fear, this course is jam packed with material that will help you create a membership site in less a day by simply adapting the information given in practice.

Beside the common knowledge about WordPress you don’t need to pose any specific technical abilities or knowledge as the course assumes that you are a complete beginner just starting out!

Few of the modules we are going to cover in this WordPress course:

  • Configure the different payment options available
  • Create a sandbox account in PayPal for payment testing
  • Customize & adapt the different content restriction modules
  • Configure the file download options for different member levels
  • Restrict access based on the custom capabilities available
  • Customize and generate an unique welcome page for your member’s
  • Discover the power of incremental access and how to use it
  • How to create & add an unlimited amount of levels instantly
  • Configure automatic level upgrades for your members
  • Protect your video by encrypting it with Amazon S3

After you complete this course you will be able to quickly install, configure and run a membership site in WordPress in less than 24 hours!
title: How to Build a Membership Site in Wordpress in 24 Hours
